identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a trustworthy, modern, and emotionally resonant educational exchange platform for Dublin, avoiding generic SaaS tropes.
principles: Emotion: Trust through clarity and nature-inspired tones
Content: Data is beautiful (clear pricing, schedules)
Negative Space: Generous padding for readability

primary.description: Deep Emerald Green - Trust, Heritage, Ireland

secondary.description: Pale Mint Mist - Backgrounds, Soft UI

strategies.landing: Asymmetric Bento Grid for features, Full-width Hero with search
strategies.details: Hero Header (Image + Title) + 2/3 Content Col + 1/3 Sticky Action Col

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary/10 hover:border-primary/30 hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all

cards.school_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-border bg-white hover:shadow-2xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300
cards.feature_card: bg-surface p-8 rounded-3xl border-none hover:bg-emerald-50/50 transition-colors

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

navigation.style: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-100 sticky top-0 z-50

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on primary green is white. Ensure text on mint background is dark emerald.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'colors' and 'fontFamily' defined above.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'radius' to '0.75rem' (rounded-xl) and use the custom colors.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' philosophy. Don't just stack divs. Use col-span-X to create interesting layouts.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
6. ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' if you need more weight.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Spacing: Use p-8, p-12, p-16. Give content room to breathe.
Micro-interactions: Every button needs a hover state. Every page needs a transition.
Dark Mode: This design is optimized for Light Mode (Trust/Education). If implementing Dark Mode, use Slate-900, not pure black.
